titleStmt.title: To the right honorable the lords of His Maiesties most honorable Privey Counsell
titleStmt.author: Broughton, Hugh, 1549-1612.

notesStmt.note: Text begins: "I have set forth (Right Honorable) sundry bookes, institutions for Iewes in our Christianity."
Place and date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
